Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@
+
+import click
+
+class State():
+    def __init__(self):
+        self.verbosity = 0
+        self.debug = False
+    
+pass_state = click.make_pass_decorator(State, ensure=True)
+
+def verbosity_option(f):
+    def callback(ctx, param, value):
+        state = ctx.ensure_object(State)
+        state.verbosity = value
+        return value
+    return click.option()
+import click
+
+class State():
+    def __init__(self):
+        self.verbosity = 0
+        self.debug = False
+    
+pass_state = click.make_pass_decorator(State, ensure=True)
+
+def verbosity_option(f):
+    def callback(ctx, param, value):
+        state = ctx.ensure_object(State)
+        state.verbosity = value
+        return value
+    return click.option()
+
